name: fuga-music-product-management
description: Simple product management system for a music-centric environment

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose exec backend npm run db:init
scripts.db:seed:extensive: docker-compose exec backend npm run db:seed:extensive
scripts.db:seed:minimal: docker-compose exec backend npm run db:seed:minimal
scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker system prune -f

author: Adnan Labiadh
